catalog_script_client.name: NeedIT populate country field

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_89d5e0cf47c131107394e624336d439f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Add new Need IT record">43fb140747c131107394e624336d43a1</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:62fc9c4747c131107394e624336d4313</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>NeedIT populate country field</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {

  // Modified the if to return if the newValue == oldValue to avoid
  // unecessary trips to the server
  if (isLoading && !g_form.isNewRecord() || newValue === '' || newValue == oldValue) {
    return;
  }

  // Instantiate the GetEmailAddress Script Include 
  var getUserCountry = new GlideAjax('GetUserCountry');
  // Specify the getEmail method
  getUserCountry.addParam('sysparm_name','getUserCountry');
  // Pass the Requested for sys_id
  getUserCountry.addParam('sysparm_userID', g_form.getValue('u_requested_for'));
  // Send the request to the server
  getUserCountry.getXML(populateCountryField);


  // When the response is back from the server
  function populateCountryField(response){
    // Extract the country from the response, clear any value from the country field, 
    // set new value in the country field
    var countryFromScriptInclude = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
    g_form.clearValue('u_user_country_code');
    g_form.setValue('u_user_country_code',countryFromScriptInclude);
  }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-07 12:02:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>89d5e0cf47c131107394e624336d439f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIT populate country field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_89d5e0cf47c131107394e624336d439f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-07 12:02:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
